Assignment.AssignmentText:
For this assignment, you will create a product page using HTML and CSS with a FLEX design pattern. Your product page should include the following details:
1. Product name 2. Product image 3. Product description 4. Product features 5. Product specifications 6. Product price 7. Add to cart button
To complete this assignment, you can follow these steps:
Step 1: Create a new HTML file and add the necessary HTML tags to create the basic structure of your page.
Step 2: Add a CSS file and link it to your HTML file. You can use this file to create the layout and style for your product page.
Step 3: Use the FLEX design pattern to create a responsive layout for your product page. This will ensure that your page looks good on different devices and screen sizes.
Step 4: Add the product details to your page. This should include the name, image, description, features, specifications, and price.
Step 5: Style your page using CSS. You can use CSS to customize the colors, fonts, and other visual elements of your page.
Step 6: Add an "Add to Cart" button to your page. This button should allow users to add the product to their shopping cart.
Step 7: Test your page to make sure it looks good and functions properly.
Here are some resources you can use to help you complete this assignment:
1. W3Schools HTML Tutorial - https://www.w3schools.com/html/ 2. W3Schools CSS Tutorial - https://www.w3schools.com/css/ 3. CSS-Tricks Flexbox Guide - https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/a-guide-to-flexbox/
Good luck with your assignment!
